name: Country Chicken with Creamy Gravy (Chicken)
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: (4 oz.) skinned, boned chicken breast halves

instructions: Place cereal, paprika, poultry seasoning, thyme, salt, and pepper in a shallow dish, stirring well to combine. Pour eggs in a shallow bowl or dish. Dip chicken breast halves in eggs to coat. Dredge in cereal mixture. Place coated chicken in a 11 x 7 x 2 inch baking dish with thickest portions towards outside of dish. Cover with wax paper, and microwave at high for 12 minutes or until chicken is done. Rotate dish a half turn every 4 minutes. You can also bake chicken in the oven at 350Â° for 30 to 35 minutes. Spoon Creamy Gravy evenly over chicken. Serve immediately.
